task.summary: Default task
Initialize IntersectionalLightingEngine rather than using static methods (since the methods are no longer static).
Initialize IntersectionalLightingEngine rather than using static methods (since the methods are no longer static).
Cleanup across the code base to deal with the new LightingEngine design.
Ray tracing test should emit a jpeg instead of a ppm.
Default camera is a pinhole camera.
Point at our cloud maven repository.
Enable snapshots.
New build pipeline config.
We need to retrieve the value of the color using the get method or the executor pool gets stuck.
Corrected test.
Working towards support for a distance estimator engine. We will be using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing will be done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing.
Working towards support for a distance estimator engine. We will be using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing will be done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing.

Completed support for a distance estimator engine. We are using the same basic LightingEngine functionality, but the tracing is done using distance estimation instead of ray tracing. We've fixed the null pointer issues.
RenderPanel is now using the new form of ray tracing that doesn't directly require RGB.
Corrected RenderParameters specification.
Minor changes.
AbstractSurfaceUI and SurfaceUIFactory need to be included here so that legacy xml files can be imported.
Minor changes to RayTracingTest.
The RayMarchingEngine passes along itself as the surface to render.
Added getAllSurfaces method to ShaderParameters. Added support for a striped floor in the RayTracingTest.
This is version 0.2.
Improvements to many primitives (though get() and expect() are not implemented for most), improvements to RenderPanel.
Improvements to the RenderPanel which resolve some issues with live rendering.
Updated to match Common 0.4 API, which is working to phase out getColorAt method.
Upgrade to Common 0.5-rc. Added use of GeneratedColorProducer in AmbientLight.

Shaders are now using GeneratedColorProducer to record the shader that produced the color. This will allow the diagnostic view in the desktop application to inspect the color pipeline on a per-shader basis.
Migrated rigid bodies into rings.
PointLight implements Positioned.
Modified to match new Light and Texture interface definitions.
Migrated a range of functionality from PhotonField into Rings.
Reworking PinholeCameraAbsorber and RigidBodyPinholeCamera so they can be used together.
Expanding OpenGL functionality.
Added glutWireCube method.
More OpenGL functionality.
Solid sphere.
More OpenGL support.
SurfaceCanvas responds to SurfaceEvents.
More OpenGL support.
More OpenGl support.
More OpenGl support.
Added sInit method to DefaultGLCanvas so that static data structures can be initialized by other systems.
Added isGLES1 method.
SuperShape now properly subclasses GLSpatial. GLSpatial is now a RenderableGeometry.
SuperShapeParams is a public class now.
Renamed CamTrack to AnimationTrack. Minor updates to SuperShape and DefaultGLCanvas.

MESSAGE.value: The RayMarchingEngine passes along itself as the surface to render.
Added getAllSurfaces method to ShaderParameters. Added support for a striped floor in the RayTracingTest.
This is version 0.2.
Improvements to many primitives (though get() and expect() are not implemented for most), improvements to RenderPanel.
Improvements to the RenderPanel which resolve some issues with live rendering.
Updated to match Common 0.4 API, which is working to phase out getColorAt method.
Upgrade to Common 0.5-rc. Added use of GeneratedColorProducer in AmbientLight.

Shaders are now using GeneratedColorProducer to record the shader that produced the color. This will allow the diagnostic view in the desktop application to inspect the color pipeline on a per-shader basis.
Migrated rigid bodies into rings.

Modified to match new Light and Texture interface definitions.
Migrated a range of functionality from PhotonField into Rings.
Reworking PinholeCameraAbsorber and RigidBodyPinholeCamera so they can be used together.

More OpenGL functionality.
Solid sphere.
SurfaceCanvas responds to SurfaceEvents.
More OpenGL support.
More OpenGl support.
Added sInit method to DefaultGLCanvas so that static data structures can be initialized by other systems.
Added isGLES1 method.
SuperShape now properly subclasses GLSpatial. GLSpatial is now a RenderableGeometry.
SuperShapeParams is a public class now.
Renamed CamTrack to AnimationTrack. Minor updates to SuperShape and DefaultGLCanvas.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Renamed CamTrack to AnimationTrack. Minor updates to SuperShape and DefaultGLCanvas.
